::KitKat::

she saw Drillbit yelling at Testifier.  She looked and saw a haze 
creep into her vision.  She tried to speak but couldn't.  She fell on 
the ground and went into stasis lock.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "KitKat saved Land Mine. She would have been doomed to torture. And 
she
> has nearly tortured herself after doing it. You think KitKat did 
that
> with no remorce? It has hurt her just as much. We should be morning 
the
> loss together. Land Mine trusted us, shouldn't you?" DrillBit says,
> trying to get through to the bot.
